EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering! Please see event details below.
Date & Time: Tuesday, May 31st to Friday, June 3rd
Location: Pivotal San Francisco 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor San Francisco, CA 94103 Room: Ursa Major Map <[[http://pivotal.io/locations/sanfrancisco]]>
Questions? Please contact Paul Santos at psantos@pivotal.io <[[mailto:psantos@pivotal.io]]>.
